metadata.title: CVE-2018-3721 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: lodash node module before 4.17.5 suffers from a Modification ofAssumed-Immutable Data (MAID) vulnerability via defaultsDeep, merge, andmergeWith functions, which allows a malicious user to modify the prototypeof "Object" via __proto__, causing the addition or modification of anexisting property that will exist on all objects.

criterions.comment: node-lodash: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
